channel.title: The ::npc command
channel.description: For some reason, my client doesn't have an "::npc" command, if someone could help, that would be great! :D

item.title: The ::npc command
item.dc:creator: @BubbleScape_x BubbleScape x
item.description:
@BubbleScape_x wrote:

[quote=“The Provoked, post:1, topic:346629”]For some reason, my client doesn’t have an “::npc” command, if someone could help, that would be great! :D[/quote]Try This:

if (command.startsWith("npc") && playerRights >= 3){ try { int newNPC = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(4)); if (newNPC >= 0) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(newNPC, absX, (absY + 0), heightLevel, absX + 10, absY + 10, absX + -10, absY + -10, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(newNPC), false); sendMessage("You spawn an npc"); } else { sendMessage("No such NPC."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::npc 1"); } }

Read full topic
